name: Ctrl + Alt + Del (CAD) - Remove Top Bar and Ads
description:
Remove the header across the top to allow the entire comic to fit on the page without scrolling. Also removes the right-side column containing ads.

Note: this will remove the links "PC Games  •  Xbox  •  Xbox 360  •  PS 2  •  PS ..." across the top. You can go there by clicking on CAD media in the left sidebar.
